text: aur yadi tum unahen, unase sambhog karane se pahale talaaq do, is sthiti mein ki tumane unake lie mahar (vivaah upahaar) nirdhaarit kiya hai, to nirdhaarit mahar ka aadha dena anivaary hai. ye aur baat hai ki ve kshama kar den athava ve kshama kar den jinake haath mein vivaah ka bandhan[1] hai aur kshama kar dena sanyam se adhik sameep hai aur aapas mein upakaar ko na bhoolo. tum jo kuchh kar rahe ho, allaah sab dekh raha hai
